themes.title: Fundamentals
themes.query: What are the fundamentals of blockchain technology?
themes.description: Blockchain is a decentralized digital ledger that records transactions across multiple computers.

themes.title: Applications
themes.query: What are the applications of blockchain technology?
themes.description: Blockchain has various applications, including cryptocurrency, supply chain management, and more.
